contagious.translation[0].definitions[0]: a disease that is contagious can be passed from person to person by touch
contagious.translation[0].definitions[1]: a person who is contagious has a disease that can be passed to another person by touch
The patient is still highly contagious.
contagious.translation[0].definitions[2]: if a feeling, attitude, or action is contagious, other people are quickly affected by it and begin to have it or do it
